Skill required:Marketing Operations - Video Content Production & Delivery  Designation:Associate  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? Help balance increased marketing complexity and diminishing marketing resources. Drive marketing performance with deep functional and technical expertise, while accelerating time-to-market and operating efficiencies at scale through Data and Technology, Next Generation Content Services, Digital Marketing Services & Customer Engagement and Media Growth Services. Role requires Digital Marketing Ads & Promotion creation/design In this role, you will be required to create end-to-end video solutions with production, content creation and multimedia editing with broadcast capabilities. You must also have an expertise in high quality videos, both for internal & external clients, leveraging complex, state of the art dedicated in-house broadcast infrastructure.  What are we looking for? Adobe InDesign  Adobe Illustrator  Adobe Photoshop  Graphic Design - Video  Video Content Production & Delivery  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Collaboration and interpersonal skills  Agility for quick learning  Corporate planning & strategic planning Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column2: We are hiring talented PHP Developers with 1+ years experience to join our team in Coimbatore to work for US and UK-based clients.     Your primary goal will be responsible for developing innovative and high-quality web applications, a visual web development platform. You will collaborate with our project managers, designers, and other developers to deliver exceptional solutions to our clients.     To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming, an understanding of MVC designs, and working knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Ultimately, a top-level PHP Developer can design and build efficient PHP modules while seamlessly integrating front-end technologies.   Responsibilities          Conducting analysis of website and application requirements.             Writing back-end code and building efficient PHP modules.             Developing back-end portals with an optimized database.             Troubleshooting application and code issues.             Integrating data storage solutions.             Responding to integration requests from front-end developers.             Finalizing back-end features and testing web applications.             Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.     Requirements          Bachelor s degree in computer science or a similar field.             Knowledge of PHP web frameworks including CodeIgniter.             Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS3, JavaScript, and HTML5.             Understanding of object-oriented PHP programming.             Previous experience creating scalable applications.             Proficient with code versioning tools including Git, CVS, and SVN.             Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases including MySQL, and MongoDB.             Ability to project manage.             Good problem-solving skills.

column2: Job Title: Marketing and Design Associate Company: Dr Dad Are you passionate about children's health and making a difference in the lives of parents and infants? Dr Dad, a leading organization dedicated to the betterment of children's health, is seeking an Intermediate Experience Candidate to join our team in Dwarka, New Delhi. About Us: Dr Dad is committed to providing top-quality products for infants and serving as a comprehensive resource platform for pregnancy and parenting-related knowledge. We strive to empower parents with the information and tools they need to ensure the well-being of their children. Responsibilities: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative content and designs for various platforms, including social media, websites, and promotional materials. Create engaging visuals using design tools such as Canva to support marketing campaigns and initiatives. Conduct research on industry trends, parenting topics, and competitor analysis to inform marketing strategies. Assist in managing social media accounts, particularly Instagram, Pinterest, and other relevant platforms. Requirements: Intermediate experience in marketing or related field. Strong willingness to learn new skills and stay updated on industry trends. Interest in research and reading, particularly in topics related to pregnancy and parenting. Proficiency in design software, with a focus on Canva or similar platforms. Basic knowledge of social media platforms, including Instagram, Pinterest, etc. Excellent communication and teamwork skills. Location and Schedule: Location: Dwarka, New Delhi Schedule: Monday to Saturday, 10:00 am to 7:00 pm (Sundays Off) If you're passionate about making a difference in children's health and possess the skills and attributes we're looking for, we'd love to hear from you! Join us at Dr Dad and be a part of a team dedicated to shaping a healthier future for our little ones. How to Apply: Please send your resume and portfolio showcasing your design work to info@drdad.in. Be sure to include a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you're excited about the opportunity to work with Dr Dad.
column11: Canva, Video Editing, Avid Learner, Social Media, Youtube, Exploration, Instagram, Research

column2: This position works within the Multichannel Marketing and Innovation team     and is responsible to conceptualise, create and execute on marketing communications and digital content via various channels to support the Marketing Strategies of our Medtronic Operating Units and Asia Region Led Markets.       A Day in the Life           Responsibilities include the following and other duties may be assigned.          In-house creative expert that supports internal clients to develop on-brand, printed and digital marketing materials such as brochures, PowerPoint presentations, animation and video to drive business results internally and externally.             Produces promotional content for marketing campaigns including social, edm, web, video, animations, paid sponsorship content and convention graphics          Evaluates and modifies promotion or advertising programs.          Prepares and/or approves all technical and artistic phases of the finished promotional material.          Consults with company management, product managers, sales department, and advertising agencies to develop and implement creative approach and execution.          May perform, coordinate, or oversee activities such as layout and creative of sales campaigns, internet promotions, copywriting and booth graphics.             Ensures on a consistent basis that high-quality work is delivered on time and on budget.          May manage third party design agencies and/or consultants in support of business objectives.          Work within and actively promote Medtronic s Mission, corporate strategies, policies, procedures and Code of Conduct.          Comply with Medtronic s Finance and Legal policies and procedures, respond to both Internal and External Audit enquiries in a timely manner, and ensure follow-up on Action Items to address Audit recommendations.          All activities must be performed in compliance with the local Quality System.          Performs duties in compliance with environmental, health and safety related site rules, policies or governmental regulations.          All other duties as assigned.          Travel requirement:      Less than 10%                  Must Have: Minimum Requirements           Advanced knowledge of InDesign, Photoshop, Acrobat and Adobe Creative Suite          Advanced video creation and editing capability          Intermediate to advanced knowledge of MS Office suite of software.          Knowledge of Adobe Experience Manager or other CMS system          Knowledge of Eloqua EDM platform viewed favourably          Social Media platforms & HTML          Knowledge of TGA Advertising code viewed favourably          Creative agency experience viewed favourably          Ability to work cross regions         Nice to Have             Excellent creative and design skills          Excellent communication and interpersonal skills          Outstanding attention to detail          Customer focused with exceptional follow through and accountability          Good organisation and time management skills, including working independently and unsupervised, able to prioritise and handle multiple tasks          Good Copywriting ability          Self-motivated and positive          Team oriented and friendly          Results oriented          Like Change and Variety          Reliable and positive, with a Can do attitude.

column2: Skill required:  Talent Development - Learning Content Development Designation:  Visual Design Senior Analyst Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 5 to 8 years  What would you do? The Media / Graphics Senior Analyst provides graphics production or audio and video elements for training assets or other Accenture projects. The Media / Graphics Senior Analyst designs and creates original material using basic elements of graphic design and media development typically creating moderately complex assets. The job requires a low level of supervision.Media / Graphics Senior Analysts may specialize in graphics or media and are not necessarily skilled in both areas.The Learning Content Development team focuses on developing learning activities and supporting materials (for instructor-led training, web-based training, application simulations and performance simulation) according to the content design plan. The team is responsible for creating content for e-learning modules, developing training solutions using prescribed tools, quality, budget and milestone standards. The team is also responsible for participating in course test activities such as cycle testing, UAT, editorial and instructional design checks to properly document problems for issue resolution. What are we looking for? Education:  Bachelors degree preferred in Communications, Radio and Television, Video/Film Production, Multimedia Design and Production, Art, Fine Arts, Electronic Arts related field or equivalent experience.Work Experience:  6-12 months or hands on experience with audio/video production, Photoshop, Illustrator, and/or FlashWork Requirements: NoneMedia Strong understanding of audio and video production processes. Working knowledge of media development hardware (e.g. camera operation, lighting, set design) Knowledge of software production tools (i.e., Adobe Premiere; Adobe After Effects, Soundforge) Strong understanding of media designGraphics Proficient in graphic production on the Windows operating system. Solid visual design skills (color, composition, typography, etc.) for on-line (internet) delivery and print. Proficient in use of industry standard graphics software (e.g., Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Illustrator, etc.) Basic ability to estimate design and development time for specific tasks.  Roles and Responsibilities:  Media Perform basic audio and/or video production for training assets &/or highly visible projects for Accenture and its leadership (i.e. Accenture Partner meeting videos) Coordinate pre-production, production, and post-production activities (resource and project planning, talent screening and selection, video shoots, etc.) Produce and direct simple to moderately complex audio and video components Capture, edit, and compress simple digital audio and video. Operate production and post-production equipment, hardware, and software Maintain media equipment Setup and tear down video and audio equipment for shoots Perform Quality Assurance on media deliverables based on CDC media and graphics standards and provide feedback to team/media developers Participates in usability testing and product correction Participates in efforts to correct, enhance, tailor and upgrade existing courses Participate in continuous improvement initiatives. Participates in usability testing and product correction Participates in efforts to correct, enhance, tailor and upgrade existing training assets Assists in issue resolution by utilizing all support resources available Complete repetitive media tasks (i.e., editing video, digitizing audio and video clips, reviewing scripts, burning CDs) Assists in issue resolution by utilizing all support resources available Provides regular status to Media Lead and escalates issues as necessaryGraphics  Produce moderately complex graphics and/or animations for, but not limited to, graphical user interfaces, information visualization, and learning activities, based primarily on art direction by Media / Graphics Lead or Senior Lead. Design and create original visuals using basic elements of graphic design (i.e., color theory, typography, layout, design software); identify multiple design solutions when needed. Conceptualize visual approach for low-complexity projects.  Oversee own aspects of the production process and ensure designs are brand compliant. Communicate the status of projects to project team including total time estimate, time of completion, and outstanding issues. Work toward developing/deepening visual design and interactive authoring skills.  Keep current on new graphic techniques and technologies, recommending changes as appropriate. Participate in continuous graphic improvement initiatives. Participates in usability testing and product correction Participates in efforts to correct, enhance, tailor and upgrade existing courses and training assets Qualification Any Graduation

column1: Web Designer cum Digital Marketing Specialist
column2: Maintain multiple websites operating on WordPress platform, other CMS, and custom based.      Create awesome landing pages that drive leads for sales      Create visually appealing promotional material (Graphics, Banners, Images, icons) for our Websites, Blogs, Pre-Sales Proposals, PPTs and social media      Visually refresh our websites regularly to take advantage of new technologies and keep visitors engaged      Maintain our sites in WordPress, applying best practices in web compliance and SEO      Troubleshooting all Hosting related issues including front end, server side, hosting, DNS, SSL Certificates, CPanel etc.      Ensures HTML/ CSS is cross-browser and standards compliant and meets accessibility/disability requirements.      Design engaging and responsive landing pages for PPC , Paid campaigns      Optimizing sites for maximum speed and scalability      Integrating websites with existing applications on campus or third-party/open-source platforms.      Build converting and compelling SEO and PPC Landing Pages      Manage Basic Level Google AdWords and Analytics      Work closely and cohesively with clients, web developers, content writers, marketing, and other contributors to ensure project release on-time            Qualifications:            Must be willing to work in Night Shifts (US Shifts) -7 PM to 4 AM        Must be proficient in HTML, CSS, SCSS, jQuery, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5 & above      Must have knowledge of Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, XD, After Effects or any other prototyping software      Must have expertise in designing site graphics, images, icons, banners, infographics etc.        Must have expertise in WordPress Customization and Plugins        Hands on experience in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, Flash, CorelDraw and other design application        Must have good knowledge on Google Adwords, Facebook Ads, PPC campaigns, Keywords Research        Must have good knowledge of SEO and SEM best practices      Good Oral and Written communication skills
column11: jQuery, Wordpress, Javascript, CMS, DNS, Presales, HTML, SEO, Troubleshooting, Open source
